objects.text:
Japanese Quartz Movement
Stainless Steel Construction
Waterproof Chronograph Design
Auto Date Function

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern aesthetic designed to promote a luxury wristwatch. The background uses a dark radial gradient with geometric and circular golden line accents that enhance elegance. The layout is structured: the **heading** text sits prominently at the top in a futuristic font, colored white. Just below, a golden **subheading** adds a premium touch. A **description** block lists product features in a clean white font.

A high-quality **product_image** of the watch dominates the right side, with a large, bold **price** tag displayed on the bottom-left. Below that, a **cta_background** rectangle frames a bold black **cta** button encouraging user engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#000000`
- Charcoal Gray: `#1A1A1A`, `#303030`
- Metallic Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image portrays a sleek, modern wristwatch with a sophisticated monochromatic palette. Dominated by deep shades of black and gunmetal gray, the watch exhibits a luxurious and professional aesthetic. The base color is a polished Black (#000000), enhanced by gradients of Gunmetal Gray (#2C2C2C) and Charcoal (#3B3B3B). The dials feature a brushed Steel Silver (#B0B0B0) for contrast and legibility. The high-gloss finish across the metal strap and case creates a reflective shine, subtly blending light and dark tones for depth. These hues work harmoniously to emphasize the watch's premium look, making a strong visual impact ideal for an advertisement banner.
